title: Buttermilk Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '160g porridge oats', '225g butter, softened', '100g caster sugar', '175g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '75g buttermilk', '150g raisins', '90g chopped walnuts']
